duck: Plot (narrative) - Plot is a literary term defined as the events that make up a story, particularly as they relate to one another in a pattern, in a sequence, through cause and effect how the reader views the stor...
plot definition: a small area of planted ground.

milestones: Woman found guilty of plotting to sell Coke documents to Pepsi
Two students in Germany accused of plotting a school attack
ChÃ¡vez accuses US of plotting separation of oil rich state
Virginia man arrested for plotting to bomb Washington DC metro
Three men convicted by UK court of plotting to bomb airliners
Judge sentences Ali to 30 years for Bush assassination plot
Man receives 30 years in prison for plotting Bush assassination
UK airplane bomb plotters sentenced, sent to jail
Turkey charges seven military officers over coup plot
Bail denied in Laos overthrow plot, Hmong protest
Former Chadian leader receives death sentence
Melbourne terror raids nab suspects
17 terrorism suspects arrested in Belgium
Nine dead after armed Santa Claus opens fire in LA suburb
Judge refuses to dismiss charge against Barack Obama assassination plotter
Two suspected terrorists arrested in Mumbai, India
Five found guilty of UK bomb plot
Al-Qaeda says bin Laden death will 'not be wasted'; Pentagon releases videos of terrorist leader in compound
Internally distributed DHS memo: al-Qaeda and Hezbollah may attack U.S. within three years
'Serious' terror threat in Mumbai; police hunt four suspected militants
Church of Scientology falsely accuses internet group 'Anonymous' of 2007 school shooting

wiki.text:
Film *''Plot'' (film), a 1973 French-Italian film *The Plot (film) a 1991 film
featuring Peter Sebastian

Land *A piece of land a person is buried in, see Grave *A piece of land used for
building on, see Land lot *Plot plan, an architecture, engineering, and/or
landscape architecture plan drawing—diagram which shows the buildings, utility
runs, and equipment layout, the position of roads, and other constructions of an
existing or proposed project site at a defined scale

Music *''The Plot'' (album) a 1976 album by jazz trumpeter Enrico Rava *The Plot
(band), a band formed in 2003

Other *Plot (graphics) *Plot (narrative)

Plotting 'Plotting' may refer to: *''Plotting'' (arcade game), a 1989 Taito
puzzle video game, also called Flipull *''Plotting'' (non-fiction), a 1939 book
on writing by Jack Woodford *Motion planning, a term used in robotics for the
process of detailing a task into atomic motions *A type of Printer (computing)
*Plotting board, a mechanical device to track a target and derive the direction
and range needed to direct the fire of guns to hit that target

See also *Plotter (disambiguation) * *
wiki.title: Plot
